A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Made an account to just say how disappointed I am in this film. After TFA I was excited for this trilogy but now I dont even want to see the next one because of how ruined the story is. I mean Johnson took every good piece of story that Abrams created and threw it away. Its such a shame. This movie flat out sucked. Being PC doesnt make a good movie\, but its clear that some critics and audience members are blind to this. Saw it a few hours ago and still cant stop thinking about how bad it was and how much it really just destroyed my hope for the prequel series. RIP Star Wars: 12/15/2017
